reviews.review: This game is great, I was stuck a few times but overall not a very difficult game
love this game ! , when Portal 3 coming up ? [ - - JOKE :( - - ]
Love puzzle games and fps this merges the two in such a fassion that I enjoy!
Great game, alot of fun got to have patience tho.

WELL HERE WE ARE AGAIN,
IT'S ALWAYS SUCH A PLEASURE.

 Aperture Laboratory strikes again. Be you a returning fan or a complete new player to portal, do not threat about needing to have played the first game, the humour and the development of the story does not require it. This game feels like new and old at the same time the familiarity of the first game is evident but the challenges are so much more. You need this in your library! it's just fabulous and keeps your mind thinking of ways to solve the challenges you face
One of the greatest puzzle and/or co-op games of all time

great game .
please play it if you have not
I've spent years playing this game. Before I even got this Steam account I was playing it on my PS3. Greatest video game of all time, period.

Это очень крутая игра, в ней нужна логика. Топовый графон и геймплей. Идёт на средние пк и стобильно 60 fps. СОВЕТУЮ ВСЕМ И НЕ ПОЖЕЛЕЕТЕ ЕСЛИ ПОТРАТИТЕ ДЕНЬГИ НА ЭТУ ИГРУ ТАК КАК В НЕЙ МОЖНО ИГРАТЬ С ДРУГОМ. Только жалко то что если выйдешь то весь результат праподёт(. ВСЕМ СОВЕТУЮ!!!
I really recommend this game. It is a great continuation of the first while adding on to it's mechanics. If you love puzzle based games this would definitely be for you.

É bom mano, é MUITO bom. Tanto o single player quanto o coop são MUITO bons. por 2 reais e da pau em muito jogo mais caro.
Pode pegar sem medo nenhum se gostar de puzzles.
Still tons of fun after coming back.
Tremendo juego de puzzles para pasar el rato en modo historia o con un amigo en cooperativo el cual es muy troll si no tenes amigos con cerebro.
Одна из игр, в которой все построено на логике.
Bought it for 71p and beat it within 2 hours (co op), could've refunded it but enjoyed it enough to keep it.
10/10 would betray my friend in coop again
Lovely game, would recommend especially when you want to do the co-op.
Pretty fun game that made me feel like an absolute idiot
Поиграл 10 минут и сразу почувствовал приступы тошноты.Играл в коопе на комнатах с рейтингом.
Лучшая игра для игры с другом ))))
One of the most iconic Valve games, a must play.

thanks a lot u idiot thanks a lot rachel thanks a lot thanks to you my charger is not charging on my ipad because it got used to your ipad instead of mine its not charging my ipad and its all you fault i hope youre happy because i told mom
Fun puzzle game with an amazing story. You cant pass it up for $.99
love this game 10/10 never get tired of playing
Игра очень крутая и интересная особено копертив
phenomenal puzzle game. Story is good, which is unthought of for a puzzle game. The level editor is really good as well
Als je hem nog niet hebt... kopen! pracht spelletje samen met portal 1 voor €1,20 is het zeker waard
Грав в піратку, пройшов. Гра крута. Навідмінно від першої частини. Вирішив купити в паці з іншими іграми. Графіка, фізика, просто на висоті.
love this game would love to see a portal 3

Très bon jeu que ce soit en solo ou en duo (meilleur coop jamais vue)
Un jeu a tester absolument pour plusieurs heures de fun entre potes.
un historia demasiado divertida y feliz
Great game especially with the open workshop!

This game is a masterpiece, the puzzles are great and the dialogue is simply incredible.
Too bad Gabe cant count to 3.
Fun, full of character and genuinely funny, doesnt hold your hand, requires some thought but not so much that you end up scouring the internet for solutions. Ideal old school fun.

I've been playing the Co-op and it's been grand fun! I loved Portal and this game definitely lives up to its predecessor. The controls work well, and my only complaint is that it was a little bit of a hassle getting my controller to work.
The best puzzle game out their
Cool af. Best game on Steam
I have played this a lot on my 360 back in the days, and its even better than i remember. Would reccommend to everyone!

best level
best game 
best coop game (and fun :D)

Singel player is amazing BUT MULTIPLAYER IS EE'FING GODS WORK. The ammount of hours of fun this game can provide is insane one of the best games of all time I wish that they would creat a third portal with a longer story and more features.
jogo interessante bompara amigos que querem se aventurar em uma aventura co-op ou para aqueles jogadores que gostam de um desafio mental.
jogo interessante bompara amigos que querem se aventurar em uma aventura co-op ou para aqueles jogadores que gostam de um desafio mental.
we are waiting for the other games of portal series

If you like puzzles and funny story lines, then this is for you! Great gameplay and story. Puzzles are a bit challenging but not too hard. You just have to think with portals! 10/10 would recommend to millions of people who love puzzle games.
Super hra kde mužete hrát s kamarádem a společně zapojit mozkové závity :) :D
